fullplot: A comedian tries to make it as a serious actor when his reality-TV star fiancèe talks him into broadcasting their wedding on her TV show.
plot: A comedian tries to make it as a serious actor when his reality-TV star fiancèe talks him into broadcasting their wedding on her TV show.
title: Top Five

tomatoes.consensus: As smart, funny, and trenchant as writer-director-star Chris Rock's best standup work, Top Five is a career highlight for its creator -- and one of the comedy standouts of 2014.
